course_description: The course will trace the development of the Episcopal Church in the US from the English Reformation through the colonial period, the American Revolution and its aftermath, to the present time. There will be particular emphasis on Anglican identity in the context of the American experience and the current issues this raises within the Anglican Communion. Does not fulfill area requirements.
schedule_location: M 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_421
